data.message: is anyone monitoring/answering messages?....Our business page needs help, but we cannot get connected to anyone at Facebook?!?!?!

replies.message: Hey there, Maggie. We hear your frustration. For questions about Pages and ads, please reach out to our team at facebook.com/marketing. -Jordan
Facebook its more of a security/fake page/fishing issue...should we still contact them?...also, we have already sent them a message, but gotten no response

Facebook everyday we get two or three of these fake "check ins" all accompanied with a "sexy" picture that says "new to Covington...text me..." How many do we have to receive before action is taken....we have reported them and blocked them, but it keeps happening?...
